title: Bug 118780: Column aliases not shown in Expression Builder
description: When setting aliases for columns in a data set, the Expression Builder still displays the old column names when selecting the dataset.
OB: When selecting a dataset in the Expression Builder, the column names are displayed instead of the column aliases.
EB: When selecting a dataset in the Expression Builder, the column aliases should be displayed instead of the column names.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Create a new data source and a dataset.
2. Set an alias for the first column in the dataset as 'column1'.
3. Insert a data item and bind it to the dataset.
4. Open the Expression Builder.
5. Select the dataset in the Expression Builder.

Expected result: The column aliases should be shown in the Expression Builder.
Actual result: The old column names are displayed instead of their aliases.
